result.title: Report on Responsible Research and Innovation (RRI) and societal impact
result.description: Report on the state of play regarding RRI findings and activities during the first year of the project, including the final version of the ethical requirements for human participation in research. (T7.3) To comply with the education requirement under RRI, a Visual Law Lab Workshop will be organized in M9 of the project, based on the first version of the privacy policy and informed consent forms drafted under D7.1, to improve accessibility, readability, accuracy and consistency, leading to the final version of these documents. This Deliverable will also report on the societal impact of the PIMCity project.

result.title: Legal comparative analysis for multi-level relationship involving CHIs
result.description: Concrete specification of the IP legal requirements that need to be taken into account for the development of the parameters of WP1. The main focus will be on IP law and relevant legislative proposals at EU level such as the review of the Copyright Directive or the proposed Regulation for the free flow of non-personal data

result.title: ToyLabs Added-Value Components Design and Development-final version
result.description: D3.5- ToyLabs Added-Value Components Design and Development-final version [M18] - SLG D3.4 will include input from all tasks to generate an updated and last version of the ToyLabs Added-Value Components Design and Development and a revised version of technical requirements. This deliverable will finalize the development of the different components and will provide their whole functionalities as firstly identified in D3.1 and updated in the context of this deliverable.
